price: 244. Ku dagaallamana Jidka Alle, oo ogaada inuu Alle yahay wax kasta Maqle, wax kasta Ogsoon.
arabic: وَقَٰتِلُواْ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٞ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: waqātilū fī sabīli al-lahi wa-iʿ'lamū anna al-laha samīʿun ʿalīmun
